channel.title: 2 noob mistakes again :(
channel.description:
Hi,
I've been trying to add safezones and yet again i've made a mistake somewhere. Here is what i've added:
[code] || (absX >= 2292 && absX <= 2251 && absY >= 4676 && absY <= 4717)[/code] That includes the indents and everything, but It is failing to make that area safe. It remains wild. I did this in the format: [code] || (absX >= SWx && absX <= NWx && absY >= SWy && absY <= NWy)[/code]
Also, I have changed the spawn points of the shopkeepers into a new place, which is also being silly and being wild. However, I cannot access the shops as I lagg and I am disconnected when I talk to or trade with any of them. This was not a problem when they were in a safe-zone.
I think that they need to be in a safezone or something for me to not get disconnected, but I can't do that without the safezone code to work.
I haven't got the slightest idea about what is wrong with the safezone code though. Sorry!
Thanks, hope someone can help, ~Retard Monkey

item.title: 2 noob mistakes again :(
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

Hi,

I’ve been trying to add safezones and yet again i’ve made a mistake somewhere.
Here is what i’ve added:

                || (absX >= 2292 && absX <= 2251 && absY >= 4676 && absY <= 4717)

That includes the indents and everything, but It is failing to make that area safe. It remains wild.
I did this in the format:

                || (absX >= SWx && absX <= NWx && absY >= SWy && absY <= NWy)

Also, I have changed the spawn points of the shopkeepers into a new place, which is also being silly and being wild. However, I cannot access the shops as I lagg and I am disconnected when I talk to or trade with any of them.
This was not a problem when they were in a safe-zone.

I think that they need to be in a safezone or something for me to not get disconnected, but I can’t do that without the safezone code to work.

I haven’t got the slightest idea about what is wrong with the safezone code though.
Sorry!

Thanks, hope someone can help,
~Retard Monkey

Read full topic
